    • startGame

      public boolean startGame(String player, boolean erasePreviousMatches) throws LobbyException
      Description copied from class: Server
      Start the game on Server
      Specified by:
      startGame in class Server
      Parameters:
      player - is the player who asked to start the game
      erasePreviousMatches - if true, the previous match with the same players will be erased if false, the previous match with the same players will be loaded
      Returns:
      true if match has actually started (the player is the admin)
      Throws:
      LobbyException
